name: Christopher's Secret Santa Game
description:
Entry for the Secret Santa 2021 Game Jam https://itch.io/jam/secret-santa-2021

My Secret Santa was a senior game design student named Christopher. He likes Metroidvanias and works part time at a bakery. For my game I made a baker the main character in a Metroidvania style game with food themes :)

Happy Holidays, Christopher
